title: Shopping Assistant
subtitle: Prototype
description:
With the completion of executing UX research, a prototype of a proposed design to build a personal shopper who helps with composing a concise and complete list of items one would need to buy to cook recipes. The protype went through usability testing and evalutions to ensure it met expected UX goals. 
 Figma: https://bit.ly/43yWmol

title: Steam Games
description: Using JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and the D3 library, my team and I designed and created visualizations from scratch to compare and contrast data from Steam. Graphs are bidirectionally linked and made interactive to expose more data for users to view.

title: Personal Website
subtitle: Prototype
description: Designed and developed a website interface using React and Javascript, giving a more coherent and dynamic UI while utilizing React component libraries such as MUI, Ant-Design, and Bootstrap to create base components that are then customized with CSS

title: [ML] Default Payments of Credit Card Clients
description: Using Python and machine learning, we predict if a client of a credit card company will default on their next payment or not.

title: Harmonic Hustle
subtitle: A Rythm Game
description: Using C++ and OpenGL, develop a user-interactive rhythm-based game that contains multiple different scenes along with key-mapping and audio based on ECS pattern

title: Insight UBC
description: Using HTML and CSS, developed the user interface and JavaScript to send and get REST API calls to and from the server to query a dataset

title: Gallery Manager
description: Helping manage galleries and art pieces by processing data on the gallery or art piece onto a database for the client to query and track related attributes

title: Sooup: The Check-In Site
description: Team-based project to create a website--with potential for plug-in--where people can quickly check in with loved ones and feel at ease.

title: Big 2
subtitle: An Alternate Version
description: An altered version of the game Big 2 in Java with a graphic user interface through Swing and layering multiple JFrames and JPanels
